text: Kay Adams (born 27 September 1987 in Stirling) is a Scottish curler. She is left-handed. Her younger sister Vicki Chalmers (née Vicki Adams) plays in Eve Muirhead's team. ==Teams== ===Women's=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Season ! scope="col"| Skip ! scope="col"| Third ! scope="col"| Second !
